If you think at any stage in 
pregnancy that you are at risk 
of getting HIV or know you 
are HIV positive, talk to your 
midwife or doctor about HIV 
testing and counselling. You 
can	also	get	free	confidential	
advice from the National AIDS 
Helpline on 0800 567 123.
